text: A name is how the market finds you, how the tax ledger binds you, and how the Union files your liabilities. If you insist on anonymity, I can register you as a provisional entity under "Provisional Concern". You can rename later with `simchat team title <new title>`.

actions.label: Alright, fine
actions.reply: Alright, give me a proper name.

actions.label: Yes, put me down without a name
